trans-unit.source: Provides a friendly name for XAML usage of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinition" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um nome amigável para o uso XAML de uma coleção <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinitionBaseCollection> type to define a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinition> objects as a resource.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinitionBaseCollection> tipo para definir um conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinition> objetos como um recurso.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinitionBaseCollection> as a resource with the x:Key `3ControlSizeDef` and reference it from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.GroupSizeDefinitions%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinitionBaseCollection> como um recurso com a chave de x: `3ControlSizeDef` e referenciá-lo do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.GroupSizeDefinitions%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinitionBaseCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinitionBaseCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinitionBaseCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinitionBaseCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of this class.
